text: Remember that, my girl. Lucia was beyond speech. He turned to Vittoria, sitting erect, with flushed cheeks and eyes sparkling with anger. 'And now, madonna' he said smoothly,'we will continue the conversation started at the Doria Palace. Be pleased to alight.''I think'she replied coolly,'I prefer to stay where I am.
